header.locationDescription:
Live Receptionist from 8:00am to 2:00pm HST
This location does not offer mail forwarding.

overview.heading: Honolulu Virtual Office
overview.body: Secure a prestigious Honolulu address without the cost and commitment of physical real estate. With Opus VO, you can be right where the action is in Honolulu, without exhausting your finances. Have a high-stakes meeting or a client to impress? Our state-of-the-art conference rooms are ready to facilitate your success.  By opting for a virtual office in Honolulu via Opus VO, you’ll gain the services of a dedicated live receptionist. We strive to make every client interaction blend seamlessly with your brand’s individual vibe. Say goodbye to routine administrative chores by delegating them to us, allowing you more freedom to pursue your entrepreneurial vision.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Honolulu, Hawaii even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Honolulu. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Hawaii.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Honolulu virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Honolulu?
sections.body: Honolulu is far more than just breathtaking beaches and scenic beauty—it’s a burgeoning hub for businesses in tourism, tech, and healthcare. Your virtual office in Honolulu connects you to valuable industry contacts and business-boosting networking events.  Going virtual in Honolulu with Opus VO isn’t just cost-effective, it’s a tactical maneuver. Are you prepared to raise your business game? Our high-quality virtual office services await your command.  Opus VO, Honolulu @ 4819 Kilauea Avenue, Honolulu, HI 96816
